channel.title: Help FUND the DOME cgi animated series
channel.description:
Mighty Treehouse is trying to do the unprecedented: produce a full 90 minute, professional level cgi animated feature/web series at 1% of the cost. They hope to get the first two episodes done through kickstarter (where you come in) and the rest through ad revenue. You can check it out here and decide if it is worth your $$$:
[url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mightytreehouse/dome?ref=spotlight[/url]

item.title: Help FUND the DOME cgi animated series
item.dc:creator: fx1
item.description:
Why would anyone give money for this…?

Read full topic
item.source: Help FUND the DOME cgi animated series

item.title: Help FUND the DOME cgi animated series
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
the way i understood it, they’ll make all their money from kickstarter projects, they’re just taking it one episode at a time

the only place i saw anything about advertising mentioned is that they’ll upload the videos on every conceivable video sharing site, both those that have ads and those that are totally free

Read full topic
item.source: Help FUND the DOME cgi animated series
